text: 194 (one hundred [and] ninety-four) is the natural number greater than 193 and smaller than 195. ==In mathematics== * 194 is the smallest Markov number that is neither a Fibonacci number nor a Pell number * 194 is the smallest number written as the sum of three squares in five ways * 194 is the number of irreducible representations of the Monster group == References == Category:Integers
title: 194 (number)
